DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect Succinate Metoprolol ( Betaloc ZOK® ) ( 95 - 190 mg ) heart rate Stable angina patient .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Succinate Metoprolol Heart Rate Stable Angina Patients
DOC.criteria: Provision inform consent prior study specific procedure Chinese patient Heart rate ≥ 65bpm Has diagnose Stable angina least 1 month stable angina pectoris symptom within 2 week previous enrolment ( Please find diagnose criterion Stable angina Appendix C ) With Left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 50 % accord ultrasound cardiogram ; Has betablockers least 4 weeks* , dose equivalent Betaloc ZOK® 23.7547.5mg/day . Acute myocardial infarction within 6 month Unstable angina Prinzmetal 's angina II degree AV block great Significant clinical , laboratory electrocardiographic abnormality would place subject undue risk ( Investigator 's opinion ) include : Significant renal impairment ( serum creatinine > 2.0 mg/dL ) Serum Alanine Aminotransferase Aspartate Aminotransferase > 3 x upper limit reference range Serum potassium < 3.0 mEq/L Serum sodium ≤ 130 mEq/L Acute chronic hepatitis cirrhosis ( clinical diagnosis ) Uncontrolled hyperthyroidism ( clinical diagnosis ) Systolic blood pressure ≥ 180 mmHg , < 100mmHg enrolment Patients unstable , compensated heart failure ( pulmonary oedema , hypoperfusion hypotension )
